title: 3 Bed 1 Bath Apartment Little Italy
map_address: Murray Hill Rd near Mayfield Rd
posting_body: Spacious three bedroom, one bath apartment in the heart of Little Italy.
Rental application required, must consent to background check.
Price includes HEAT, water, sewer, and garbage collection.
Apartment includes private patio, original hardwood floors, large kitchen with dishwasher, updated appliances and great views of the neighborhood.
Has been freshly painted, and lots of storage throughout.
Minutes from CWRU, CIA, CIM, restaurants, shopping, museums, orchestra, hospitals, public transportation, and much more.
Directly across the street from coin laundromat.
